pkgmetadata.longdescription: 'RSpace' API Wrapper // Wrapper for the 'RSpace' Electronic Lab Notebook (https://www.researchspace.com/) API. This packages provides convenience functions to browse, search, create, and edit your 'RSpace' documents. In addition, it enables filling 'RSpace' templates from R Markdown/Quarto templates or tabular data (e.g., 'Excel' files). This R package is not developed or endorsed by 'Research Space'.
